[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 从中派生工作流加载程序服务的抽象基类。

span.span: The abstract base class from which workflow loader services are derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 可以从此类派生，创建工作流加载程序的自定义版本。You can derive from this class to create a custom version of the workflow loader. 工作流加载程序提供了一种机制，开发人员可使用该机制生成工作流定义，也可以从其他非可扩展应用程序标记语言 (XAML) 的 XML 格式生成实例。The workflow loader provides a mechanism for developers to generate workflow definitions, and in turn, instances from other XML formats that are not extensible Application Markup Language (XAML). 用户负责分析其独有的 XML 格式、生成活动树并向工作流运行时提供要执行的活动树的根。The user is responsible for parsing their unique XML format, generating an activity tree, and providing the root of the activity tree to the workflow runtime for execution.
